title: Total sales of Olive Garden in the U.S. 2016 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Sales in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 4.
Overall Sales in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Sales in billion U.S. dollars, about 4.29 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Sales in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3.84 was reported at Year 2016
